title: 歐盟/ 德國終於出聲...

replies.msg:
德國仲話必要時自己唔至歐盟先行動...最後會有幾多兌現...

https://www.dw.com/de/heiko-maas-droht-china-mit-konsequenzen/a-54309765
Zu den geplanten Maßnahmen zählte er die Vereinfachung der Einreise für Hongkong-Chinesen, einen Exportstopp für bestimmte Rüstungsgüter, Stipendienprogramme für bedrohte Wissenschaftler, Künstler oder Journalisten und ein Ende des Auslieferungsabkommens mit Hongkong.

______

英文 link:
https://www.dpa-international.com/topic/maas-threatens-consequences-hk-security-law-talks-china-urn%3Anewsml%3Adpa.com%3A20090101%3A200724-99-915017
Maas said on Wednesday that Germany might go it alone in responding to China's far-reaching new law, rather than waiting for other EU member states.

As possible measures, he suggested relaxing entry requirements to Germany for Hong Kong nationals, an export ban for certain defence equipment, scholarship programmes for threatened academics, artists and journalists, or an end to Germany's extradition treaty with Hong Kong.

Maas said on Wednesday that Germany might go it alone in responding to China's far-reaching new law, rather than waiting for other EU member states.

As possible measures, he suggested relaxing entry requirements to Germany for Hong Kong nationals, an export ban for certain defence equipment, scholarship programmes for threatened academics, artists and journalists, or an end to Germany's extradition treaty with Hong Kong.

德國仲話必要時自己唔至歐盟先行動...最後會有幾多兌現...

https://www.dw.com/de/heiko-maas-droht-china-mit-konsequenzen/a-54309765
Zu den geplanten Maßnahmen zählte er die Vereinfachung der Einreise für Hongkong-Chinesen, einen Exportstopp für bestimmte Rüstungsgüter, Stipendienprogramme für bedrohte Wissenschaftler, Künstler oder Journalisten und ein Ende des Auslieferungsabkommens mit Hongkong.

______

英文 link:
https://www.dpa-international.com/topic/maas-threatens-consequences-hk-security-law-talks-china-urn%3Anewsml%3Adpa.com%3A20090101%3A200724-99-915017
Maas said on Wednesday that Germany might go it alone in responding to China's far-reaching new law, rather than waiting for other EU member states.

As possible measures, he suggested relaxing entry requirements to Germany for Hong Kong nationals, an export ban for certain defence equipment, scholarship programmes for threatened academics, artists and journalists, or an end to Germany's extradition treaty with Hong Kong.

德國仲話必要時自己唔至歐盟先行動...最後會有幾多兌現...

https://www.dw.com/de/heiko-maas-droht-china-mit-konsequenzen/a-54309765
Zu den geplanten Maßnahmen zählte er die Vereinfachung der Einreise für Hongkong-Chinesen, einen Exportstopp für bestimmte Rüstungsgüter, Stipendienprogramme für bedrohte Wissenschaftler, Künstler oder Journalisten und ein Ende des Auslieferungsabkommens mit Hongkong.

______

英文 link:
https://www.dpa-international.com/topic/maas-threatens-consequences-hk-security-law-talks-china-urn%3Anewsml%3Adpa.com%3A20090101%3A200724-99-915017
Maas said on Wednesday that Germany might go it alone in responding to China's far-reaching new law, rather than waiting for other EU member states.

As possible measures, he suggested relaxing entry requirements to Germany for Hong Kong nationals, an export ban for certain defence equipment, scholarship programmes for threatened academics, artists and journalists, or an end to Germany's extradition treaty with Hong Kong.
